title: Certification Types
heading: Certification Types
content:
## 

Types of Certifications

[](#types-of-certifications)

There are three types of Clever integrations, each with a certification process:

1.  **Clever Library**
2.  **District Single Sign-On (SSO)**
3.  **Rostering (Secure Sync)**

If you are unsure which integration type you need to build, please use the [Integration Picker](https://airtable.com/shrUp8n3bkdGIBkGh) to help inform your decision.

* * *

### 

Clever Library

[](#clever-library)

**Library** integrations are teacher-initiated. Teachers add your application through the [Clever Library](https://clever.com/library) and can provision accounts on-demand for themselves and their students.

Data received:

-   Teacher name
-   Teacher email
-   Student first name and last initial
-   Section (class) information

To learn more, see the [Library Certification Guide](/v0.31/docs/library-certification-guide).

### 

District SSO

[](#district-sso)

**District SSO** integrations are managed by district administrators. Your application can be added through the _Request Application_ page of the district dashboard. This integration facilitates SSO for any Clever user scoped by a district administrator.

Data received:

-   User first name
-   User last name
-   Email address

To learn more, see the [District SSO Certification Guide](/docs/district-sso-certification-guide).

* * *

### 

Rostering (Secure Sync)

[](#rostering-secure-sync)

**Secure Sync** integrations are also managed by district administrators. Your application can be added through the _Request Application_ page of the district dashboard. This integration allows you to pull district, school, user, and enrollment data via the Clever API, provided the district shares the data.

Data received:

-   User personal and demographic data
-   Rostering data

To learn more, see the [Secure Sync Certification Guide](/docs/secure-sync-certification-guide).

> ## ðŸ“˜
> 
> **Available Fields**
> 
> For a detailed list of available fields in each integration type, see the [Clever API Schema](https://clever.com/schema).

> ## ðŸ“˜
> 
> **Multiple Certifications**
> 
> You can be certified for more than one integration type:
> 
> -   For Library and District SSO integration built simultaneously, submit for certification once.
> -   For Library and Secure Sync integration built simultaneously, submit for certification separately.
> -   For District SSO and Secure Sync integration built simultaneously, submit for certification once.
> -   For any combination of integration types built separately, submit for each certification separately.
